did i seem like normal in that meeting

there's a couple of things that i think
can help us manage how exhausting it

plan your day in such a way that you're

when you may not have felt you needed it

other colleagues in your office or if

when can i get some alone time taking

another thing that's really important to

how difficult it was for me literally to
